# kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Video Toolbox ](/documentation/videotoolbox)

- [ kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate ](/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate)

-  kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate 

Global Variable# kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
let kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate: CFString
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate#discussion)

Defines the maximum bitrate that can enter the video buffering verifier (VBV) model at any time in variable bitrate (VBR) mode.

The value of this property must be greater than zero. This property key is not compatible with:

- kVTCompressionPropertyKey_AverageBitRate,

- kVTCompressionPropertyKey_ConstantBitRate,

- kVTCompressionPropertyKey_DataRateLimits,

- VTVideoEncoderSpecification_EnableLowLatencyRateControl=True.
title: kVTCompressionPropertyKey_VBVMaxBitRate | Apple Developer Documentation
